title: “We stand in solidarity with Azma Bokhari”: Secretary Women’s Parliamentary Caucus
content:
ISLAMABAD, Jul 26 (APP):The Women’s Parliamentary Caucus (WPC) Friday strongly condemns the circulation of a fake video allegedly featuring Information and Culture Minister Punjab Ms. Azma Bokhari.
The secretary WPC Dr. Shahida Rehmani in a statement said “This video is a clear example of misinformation and manipulation”.
Secretary WPC said , “As women parliamentarians, we stand in solidarity with Azma Bokhari and denounce this malicious attempt to tarnish her image”.
She urged the public to be cautious and not share unverified content. In her message of condemnation, she also requested media outlets to verify information before publishing or broadcasting it.
Dr. Shahida Rehmani as Secretary Women’s Parliamentary Caucus called for penalization of the perpetrators as per the law and stated, “We demand an immediate removal of this fake video and call for those responsible to be held accountable”.
